Title: Franck Muller Color Dreams Womens Quartz Stainless Steel Watch 2852QZD1RCOLDR
Description: Watches Jewelry Accessories About us Policies Franck Muller Color Dreams Womens Quartz Stainless Steel Watch 2852QZD1RCOLDR (Click to Enlarge) Franck Muller Color Dreams Womens Quartz Stainless Steel Watch 2852QZD1RCOLDR Condition: Unworn Brand: Franck Muller Series: Hidden Retail Price: $13,400.00 Reference: 2852QZD1RCOLDR Also Known As: 2852QZD1RCOLDR Web ID: 166818 Stock Number: 2188909-M Case Size: 27 mm Gender: Ladies Movement: Automatic Bezel: Stainless Steel and Diamonds Functions: Hours, Minutes Strap: Leather Clasp Type: Tang Signatures: Franck Muller Included Items: Gift Box Materials: Stainless Steel Finishing: Stainless Steel Case Back: Solid Dial Color: Silver Bringing exuberant colors into an elegant design inspired by the iconic Art Deco movement, Franck Muller present this enchanting timepiece that compels with its refined lines, luxurious diamond brilliance and bold aesthetics as well as its sublime quality and legibility. Made of stainless steel and set with sparkling diamonds along the bezel and lugs, the graceful case is mounted onto a burgundy leather strap secured on the wrist with a tang buckle. The silver guilloché dial with multicolored Arabic numerals shows hours and minutes via central luminescent hands.
